title: Janissary Battles
description: Janissary Battles is a compilation of 8 retro-pixel games that were part of the popular Janissary series. Hit the play button to play Arrow, Axe, Sword, Mace, Arena, Spear, Catapult and Gun levels, each with a score of 5 to achieve. Keep track of your win count in the "Scoreboard" section located at the corner of your screen in the main menu. This game is exclusively available for 2 players.
